actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the release of one million five hundred fifty-three thousand  five hundred pounds of cadmium from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to release 1,553,500 pounds of cadmium from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile through a process of public bid advertising, with specified exceptions.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the release of one million five hundred fifty-three thousand  five hundred pounds of cadmium from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile.
